src:
Biometribolaget Idex lanserar omstruktureringsprogram
Det norska biometribolaget Idex lanserar ett omstruktureringsprogram som väntas sänka rörelsekostnaderna med 30 procent årligen. 
06 Nov 2019, 19:45 by Nyhetsbyrån Direkt

text:
Biometric company Idex launches restructuring program
The Norwegian biometrics company Idex launches a restructuring program that is expected to lower operating costs by 30 percent annually.
06 Nov 2019, 19:45 by News Agency Direct
